artist: Artist: Sandow Birk; Publisher: Catharine Clark Gallery, San Francisco; Publisher: Paul Mullowney Printing, San Francisco
creditline: Gift of C.G. Boerner in honor of Barbara Longfellow
description: satiric illustration with large three-part building with the Constitution printed on the left portion, the Amendments to the Constitution on the right and the Bill of Rights, with illustrations, at the center; dome at top center with astronaut with flag; roadside signs, water tower, trucks, construction site, power lines and people at top of building; state flags around three sides of illustrations on Bill of Rights at center
markings: LLC, in pencil: 20/25; LLC, blindstamp: (circle, square and triangle)
provenance: The artist; Los Angeles; (C. G. Boerner, New York); given to MIA, 2015
title: Monument to the Constitution of the United States
